SELECT u.uno as uno, uname, uphoneno, udepartment, uemail as username ,upassword as password ,expired, CODE_NAME AS bgColor, authority, enabled FROM User u JOIN Authority a ON u.uno = a.uno JOIN CodeTable c WHERE uemail = #{uemail} AND u.profileBgColor = c.CODE AND c.CODE_TYPE = '007'
